description:
An encounter with a giant swimming frog leads to a close call with a seafaring train! Next up for the Straw Hats: drop anchor at a town full of water and seek out a shipwright!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il treno marino e la metropoli dell`acqua
Le train des mers fonçant à toute allure et Water Seven, la métropole aquatique
Shissou Umi Ressha to Mizu no Miyako Water Seven
The Dashing Sea Train and the City of Water: Water Seven!
ขบวนรถเดินทะเล กับเมืองแห่งน้ำวอเตอร์เซเว่น
疾走海列車と水の都ウォーターセブン
